snippet.title: MOD resumes drilling at T3 copper
snippet.content: MOD Resources has resumed drilling today at the T3 copper project following approval of the environmental management plan. The plan will enable an unlimited number of RC and diamond drill holes to be drilled up to December 2018 within a 48km2 farm block surrounding the T3 project. T3 forms part of the JV between MOD (70%) and AIM listed Metal Tiger (30%) and includes an extensive licence holding in the central and western parts of the Kalahari copper belt. Originally published as
